message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I propose a price of $1200000 for this exceptional opportunity.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $1000000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your position, I must respectfully decline. I believe the true value of our product justifies a higher price. Therefore, I am proposing an adjusted offer of $1150000 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $1100000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am pleased to present a revised offer of $1125000 for the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Based on our previous discussions and my financial considerations, I would like to counteroffer at $1110000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your decision. In light of our ongoing dialogue, I am willing to consider $1120000 as the final offer for the product.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. Considering our previous negotiations and my financial constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $1115000.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your commitment to this product. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer the product for $1120000. This represents a significant value proposition given the product's capabilities and benefits.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. After evaluating our previous offers, I would like to make a final counteroffer at $1110000.
